I'M OKAY.

Most people become more attractive as they get older, but I can honestly say that the older I get, the less attractive I get. I suppose that when i get my braces off, I'll be much more attractive.

I'm just stressed out because my hair is at the awkward faze and I don't know if I should just bite the bullet for prom and contuine to let it grow out, or chicken out and cut it again just so it looks good. This has been a really long faze.


I'm really happy that I have a prom date that I like so much. I'm really excited, I just wish I could find a dress, that would put a little bit less stress on me. He's so cute, he's like "we can match!" However, Brad and Flea(HAHAH I BET YOU CAN GUESS WHICH ONE IS MY DATE) Have like a huge track meet in Greensboro the same day as prom. It starts at 8 in the morning and it takes about 2 hours to get there. They promise that they will make it back in time, so I'm not worried.


UM WHAT APTESTING WEEK? I HAD NO IDEA, SERIOUSLY, I DIDN'T!

Also, I'm really happy to be going to prom with Kylie and Lindsay. I've stopped talkign to a lot of people from school because I've realized how fake they are and how much I can't stand them and don't wish to associate with them anymore, but that didn't leave me with that many friends at school. I'll always have the million people that I say hello to in the hallway, but when it comes down to it, none of them really care about me, I've got my good friends and that's it. However, I guess that's ok because I'd rather have 10 friends that would all be there for me when I needed them rather than have 110 friends and have two really be there for me. Kylie and Lindsay are honestly two wonderful girls that mean a lot to me because I know they aren't fake. I love them a ton.



it's 12:30 and I can't sleep.
Leigh called me about 10 minutes ago so we could have an ever-so typical conversation about APTesting, Prom, Vaginas and drinking. 
I really wish I could sleep,
I'm getting up in like 5 hours.
http://kiss-onthelips.livejournal.com/234637.html

I have a prom date
and it's a boy!



NOW ALL I NEED IS A DRESS!

Have you ever wanted to cry when you found out a picture you took of your best friends was on the news and you don't know why?



Oh, well,
I have.

Another thing I should do; STUDY FOR MY HISTORY TEST. Yeah, I should really do that. I mean, getting anything less than an A on this test is stupid becuse Kiya told me exactly what was going to be on it.


I stress out when getting dressed for work. I'm Host 2 tonight. ICK.

I'm somewhat attracted to someone that I would have never guessed.

I wish I could make it tonight, but I've got to work.

Prom is stressing me out. Since I couldn't get ready with the Tequila crew, I made other plans. Now I CAN get ready with the Tequila crew, but I'm not sure if I'm going to/ want to cancel my plans, because I was really excited about them. I don't know what to do.

RAD= I'm staying in school.
MORE RAD= Next year, I'm taking a class @ CPCC, I talked to Browning about it yesterday. I get out @ 12:45 everyday, even though the ONE class I am taking is ONE night a week @ 6p.m. (THANK YOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU LORD) So yeah, that's cool.

I recieved a comment on my last entry that said "Shut up you fat ugly bitch" and I just laughed.

I only know of one person that flat out doesn't like me, and that is Brittany Slack. I am SURE that there are plently of other people that don't like me, but no one really comes to mind. I know that Brittany is NOT an asshole, and would never leave a comment like that, because she's not a bitch.

I'm in a really good mood at the moment though, because, normally, a comment like that would upset me and I'd be freting about who said it and all that jazz, but like, when I read it, I just deleted it without even thinkign twice and then finished what I was doing. It didn't even occur to me that I'm obviously learning to not care what people think, which is nice, because I used to take things really personally.






I'd also like to write out a formal apology to Brittany Caroline Slack. I'm sorry that I was an asshole and said those things to Amy, and I'm sorry that people are telling you that I said those things about you. I have nothing aganist you and I think you are an OK girl. I'm not expecting to be friends or anything, but I want you to know that I'm sorry for anything that I might have said that was inapporiate or bitchy.

If you wonder why rumors are being spread about you, you should probably take two fucking seconds to step back and look at your life. You're 15 fucking years old and doing ecstacy. You're not fun to be around, probably because you're always burned out. People probably wouldn't say things about you if they didn't have a reason. I don't know why you care so much what I am thought to say. You always said that you don't care what people think, but now you suddenly care what I think about you? You know that I don't like you, you KNOW that. You KNOW that you've changed and the thought of me being friends with you anymore disgusts me because you've turned into this awful person. In the end, nobody really cares about the druggies so just get over yourself and stop trying to blame every bad thing that's been said about you on me. I've had things to say about you, and your best friend told you what they were. However, it's not like I just developed those stories out of thin air. I heard them somewhere else and passed them on, yes, that was wrong, because that was just making the rumor worse, but I don't really care, because I have no social or moral obligation to you. I used to think that you were a very smart girl, but I don't really know what I was thinking. A smart girl wouldn't do this to herself. The person that you have become sucks and I'm not the only one that thinks so. I don't really care if you hate me, and I don't really care if you believe that I was not saying those things about me, because you don't really matter to me. I'm not postive that you even have enough brain cells left to remember what it was like when we were friends. I'm not trying to make anything between us worse, I'd rather just make it nothing, just like the nothing that you are to me, and the nothing that I am to you.
